title: I got the World Champion right but still haven't received my Pick Em Points???
body:
When I log in to the client both the Pick Em Master Mission and the Legendary Pursuit Mission appear unfinished. 
When I log in to My Picks in PickEm on my browser I only have 30 points because I haven't been awarded points for picking SSG as world champion yet.
It should be an extra 20 points so I should have 50 points in total, enough to complete the Pick Em Master Mission and so the Legendary Pursuit Mission too. 
Is there something I should do or should I just wait for the mission to end in 14 hrs???

replies.body: Same, I picked ssg to win worlds but I wasnt awarded any points :(. I contacted support but I didnt get a response back. Idk whats goin on.

> [{quoted}](name=letswinthisteam,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=RfR07TaE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-05T22:55:20.591+0000)
>
> Same, I picked ssg to win worlds but I wasnt awarded any points :(. I contacted support but I didnt get a response back. Idk whats goin on.

Same as you. Totally bizarre, and such a tiny thing that seems simply perplexing that it hasn't been updated still.

So in the end I did not get my points nor my icon or my worlds orb reward  >:(  I had already contacted support yesterday and sent them screenshots of my picks and the unfinished missions but NOTHING.... I am starting to understand why people HATE RIOT. I grinded to do all of the missions for nothing it seems... not falling for it again

We'll have to wait for the pickem's page to fully update for those points to be added, and I do see that Legendary Pursuit hadn't been fully finished yet. It shows you still need one more missions to finish for it to complete, was there a mission you thought should have counted towards it?
Yes, the Pick Em Master Mission. That was the last mission I needed to get Legendary Pursuit
